name: Jordan Millar & The Question - Lies In Translations
description:
“A perfect example of blending exceptional musicianship with first class, intelligent song-writing....One of the best pop albums to come out of Australia in 2008!”  Producer, Anton Hagop, (Powderfinger, Silverchair, Missy Higgins).

"It's about damn time something in the Australian scene showed the world that pop rock isn't a dying art – and Jordan Millar and the Question's debut album, Lies in Translations, might just be that something." Giselle Nguyen – Vertigo.

The long awaited debut album from Sydney 4 piece, Jordan Millar & The Question (JMQ), will finally hit record stores nationally, and iTunes, on Saturday, 6th September 2008. “Lies In Translations” is an eclectic mix of pop/rock songs that refuse to stick to the traditional formula. 


Track Listing
1. Before We've Gone Too Far
2. Lost My Way
3. Too Far To Call
4. Ride It All The Way
5. Lies In Translations
6. Let It Fall
7. Start Again
8. Two Steps Back
9. My Wisdom
10. A Picture
11. Break Me With A Word
12. Still Revolving

name: Jordan Millar & The Question EP
description:
The Debut EP from Jordan Millar & The Question.
Released in May 2007.

1. Ride It All The Way
2. Lost My Way
3. Broken Pieces
4. I'd Say Anything
5. Break Me With A Word

name: Jordan Millar - The Little Birds EP
description:
The Little Birds EP is 6 new acoustic songs written, recorded and produced by Jordan Millar at his home studio in Sydney, Australia.

1. Those Little Birds
2. Recreate You
3. All The Things I Can Tell
4. Love and Lose
5. Take A Bit Longer
6. My Wisdom
